overview:
Co-founder of Turkey’s first interactive agency, Young New Media, in 1996. Young New Media is a multiple award winning interactive agency serving top companies in Europe and Middle East in addition to its home country, Turkey.

Baris also co-founded Beyazperde.com, World’s 8th most popular movie portal, which was sold to Mynet in 2006. He later started Tvdenevar.com, 2 times award winning TV guide web site, sold to Dogan Online in 2008.

He’s leading his latest venture’s New York office since 2006. Direct IQ is a Software as a Service, an email marketing services platform serving small to medium businesses, with over 3,000 clients worldwide.
